98296.「<%sM_hiryu> ですかな。\n この名前で いいですかのう？\n<ye:
So it's <%sM_hiryu> is it?
Is this name okay?
<yesno><close>

98297.「名前の変更を やめなさるんか？\n<yesno><close>:
Are you going to stop changing the name?
<yesno><close>

98299.「…んー？ どうやら その名前は\n 付けることが できないようですだ。\n 別:
... Hmm? Apparently, you can't give it that
name. Please give it another name.

98301.「ほんでは 今から この子は\n <%sM_hiryu> だな。\n これからも:
So, from now on, this child's name is
<%sM_hiryu>.
Please continue to take good care of them.

98842.「<%sM_omekashi>は まだ\n 作ってませんなあ。\n<br>\n:
I haven't made <%sM_omekashi> yet... Once you
create it, you can add it here, so why don't
you create <%sM_omekashi>?<yesno><close>

98843.「<%sM_omekashi>に 着けかえるんかの？\n<yesno><clos:
Are you going to replace it with
<%sM_omekashi>?<yesno><close>

98844.<pipipi_on>\n「……ふ～！ できましたぞお。\n なかなかの ケッサ:
<pipipi_on>... Whoo! It's done... It's quite a
Kessaku... Shall we try it on <%sM_hiryu>
now?<yesno><close>

98846.「よ～ス！\n ほんでは ちょっと待っててくんなせえ。\n ここを こうして……:
Hi! Now, wait here for me... Here, take this.
....

98848.「……ありゃ？ そのおめかし飛竜グッズを\n 作るには 素材が 足りんようですな:
... What? It seems we don't have enough
materials to make that dress-up flying dragon
merchandise...

98849.「他にも おめかし飛竜グッズを\n 作りますかのう？\n<yesno><clos:
Do you think you can make other items for the
dressed-up Hiryu?<yesno><close>

98850.「作成済みの おめかし飛竜グッズは\n ここで 着け替えできますよお。:
You can change your dress-up flying dragon
goods here...

98851.「おめかし飛竜グッズを つくるんですな。\n どこの グッズを作りますかのう？:
I'm going to make some dressed-up flying
dragon goods... Which goods should we make?

230311.現在のプレイ環境では\n「ひりゅう」の 名前が付けられます。\n<br>\n正式:
In the current play environment, the name "Hiryu" is given... When the game is officially released, you can change the name
of your dragon at any time...
